channel.title: Shuffles and Cuts on 52
channel.description: Recent content in Shuffles and Cuts on 52

item.title: Bottom Retention Overhand Shuffle
item.description: An easy, natural way to control a card using the Overhand Shuffle.

item.title: Overhand Shuffle
item.description: The easiest, most versatile shuffle. Also great to Get into Shuffle Grip. Cut off roughly the bottom 2/3 of the deck and lift them up. Come down, drop a few cards (a packet) then move back up. Repeat step 3 until all the cards are back in your left hand. Repeat steps 2-4 until you are satisfied.
